医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现，在氟化漆中添加钙和磷酸盐并不是对抗儿童蛀牙的灵丹妙药该研究探讨了添加钙和磷酸盐的氟化钠清漆与传统清漆相比在减少学龄前儿童口腔中有害细菌方面的有效性。结果表明，两种类型的清漆在控制细菌生长方面没有显着差异，因此需要对对抗儿童早期龋齿的有效方法进行更多研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/Added-calcium-and-磷酸盐-in-fluide-varnishes-no-silver-bullet-for-fighting-kids-tooth-decay-study-finds。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/Added-calcium-and-磷酸盐-in-fluide-varnishes-no-silver-bullet-for-fighting-kids-tooth-decay-study-finds。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=41bd02bb-dab0-41d7-ac04-f81ef77f7359 Wed, 01 Nov 2023 19:46:00 -0400 Added calcium and phosphate in fluoride varnishes no silver bullet for fighting kids' tooth decay, study finds
掩盖问题：高质量研究证实口罩可显着抑制 COVID-19 传播JAMA Network Open 上的这篇“特别通讯”文章汇集了高质量的研究，强调了口罩在遏制 SARS-CoV-2 社区传播方面的有效性。文章强调，外科口罩比布口罩更有效，而且戴口罩是一种重要的公共卫生工具，既可以与疫苗接种和社交距离等其他措施结合使用，也可以独立于其他措施。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/Masking-up-matters-High-quality-studies-confirm-face-masks-significantly-curb-COVID-19-spread.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/Masking-up-matters-High-quality-studies-confirm-face-masks-significantly-curb-COVID-19-spread.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=55dd9472-5f9a-4945-b0a4-ba5c4c1517cf Wed, 01 Nov 2023 18:42:00 -0400 Masking up matters: High-quality studies confirm face masks significantly curb COVID-19 spread
临床试验证明 ALS 药物治疗急性脊髓损伤的有效性由休斯敦大学一位世界知名药理学家领导的一项包含药代动力学子研究的小型临床试验表明，利鲁唑 (Riluzole) 在改善急性脊髓损伤 (SCI) 患者的功能方面具有良好的功效，前提是该药物受伤后 12 小时内拍摄。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/Clinical-trial-demonstrates-the-efficiency-of-ALS-drug-in-treating-people-with-acute-spinal-cord-injuries.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/Clinical-trial-demonstrates-the-efficiency-of-ALS-drug-in-treating-people-with-acute-spinal-cord-injuries.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e2292cc5-0d0f-420d-bd02-f69d32281865 Wed, 01 Nov 2023 15:51:57 -0400 Clinical trial demonstrates the effectiveness of ALS drug in treating people with acute spinal cord injuries
研究人员获得 NEA 奖，测试两步音乐疗法是否可以改善慢性疼痛Regenstrief 研究所研究科学家 Matthew J. Bair（医学博士、理学硕士）和位于 Richard L. Roudebush 退伍军人医疗中心的印第安纳医学研究所 (IIMR) 荣获创造力：国家艺术基金会军事治疗艺术网络临床临床奖美国退伍军人音乐疗法和慢性疼痛的研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/Researchers-receive-NEA-award-to-test-whether-a-two-step-music-therapy-improves-chronic-pain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/Researchers-receive-NEA-award-to-test-whether-a-two-step-music-therapy-improves-chronic-pain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=162dbbc1-de52-4bdf-a5ff-700bbd7baf0a Wed, 01 Nov 2023 15:45:46 -0400 Researchers receive NEA award to test whether a two-step music therapy improves chronic pain
英国发起了一项重大新活动，鼓励接种流感和 COVID-19 疫苗英国卫生安全局 (UKHSA)、卫生和社会保障部以及英格兰国民医疗服务体系 (NHS England) 敦促那些尚未接种流感和 COVID-19 疫苗的人“坚强过冬”，并与数以百万计的其他人一起参加疫苗接种活动。在流感和 COVID-19 预计达到高峰的节日和新年之前接受此优惠。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/Major-new-campaign-launched-in-the-UK-to-encourage-flu-and-COVID-19-vaccinations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/Major-new-campaign-launched-in-the-UK-to-encourage-flu-and-COVID-19-vaccinations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=704a86c5-c521-4287-bacd-88da1915c956 Wed, 01 Nov 2023 15:40:24 -0400 Major new campaign launched in the UK to encourage flu and COVID-19 vaccinations
IBD 的微观炎症与严重感染的较高风险有关炎症性肠病（IBD）是严重感染的独立危险因素，即使胃肠道炎症水平非常低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/Microsensitive-inflammation-in-IBD-linked-to-higher-risk-of-serious-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/Microsensitive-inflammation-in-IBD-linked-to-higher-risk-of-serious-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ca5b0e48-cf23-49ec-993f-57a056bde99b Wed, 01 Nov 2023 15:37:08 -0400 Microscopic inflammation in IBD linked to higher risk of serious infections
研究显示，服用口服避孕药的女性患抑郁症的可能性较小一项新的研究表明，服用口服避孕药的女性患抑郁症的可能性较小。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/Women-take-oral-contraceptive-pill-less-likely-to-report-depression-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/Women-take-oral-contraceptive-pill-less-likely-to-report-depression-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1878503e-d27a-430b-9fcb-1dfbc5201900 Wed, 01 Nov 2023 15:34:10 -0400 Women taking oral contraceptive pill less likely to report depression, study shows
研究表明强化疗法可以挽救 α-1 抗胰蛋白酶缺乏症患者的生命根据 RCSI 医学与健康科学大学领导的新研究，提高缺乏蛋白质的水平对于患有遗传性疾病 α-1 抗胰蛋白酶缺乏症 (AATD) 的人具有明显的生存益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/Augmentation-therapy-can-save-lives-of-people-with-alpha-1-antitrypsin-deficiency-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/Augmentation-therapy-can-save-lives-of-people-with-alpha-1-antitrypsin-deficiency-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=abcf0325-d5b0-4cee-8697-a4e7da743065 Wed, 01 Nov 2023 15:24:46 -0400 Augmentation therapy can save lives of people with alpha-1 antitrypsin deficiency, study shows
JAK抑制剂为关节炎患者提供有效、便捷的治疗选择根据牛津大学出版社在《风湿病学》上发表的一篇新论文，尽管人们担心 JAK 抑制剂的有效性，但医生仍使用 JAK 抑制剂来治疗关节炎患者，但实际上效果很好。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/JAK-inhibitors-offer- effective-and-convenient-treatment-option-for-arthritis-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/JAK-inhibitors-offer- effective-and-convenient-treatment-option-for-arthritis-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0906c296-2b99-45ad-9f46-ac23a2425453 Wed, 01 Nov 2023 15:20:51 -0400 JAK inhibitors offer effective and convenient treatment option for arthritis patients
新药有望杀死具有遗传脆弱性的癌细胞想象一下身体的细胞是课堂上表现良好的学生。 “老师”是肿瘤抑制基因，它们确保细胞遵守规则。但当肿瘤抑制基因消失时，细胞可能会误入歧途。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/New-drug-shows-promise-in-killing-cancer-cells-with-genic-vulnerability.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/New-drug-shows-promise-in-killing-cancer-cells-with-genic-vulnerability.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a3e0d0ec-b9f3-4be9-b5cd-304a600173ec Wed, 01 Nov 2023 15:14:47 -0400 New drug shows promise in killing cancer cells with genetic vulnerability
